name: KIT109 Assignment 1 - Pong (CameronBl)
description:
DEVLOG 1

 

Features:

  • In keeping with the classic pong style: Added a vintage TV background.
  • Top and bottom bounds with sound effect for collision with puck.
  • Paddles with a fixed X and Z to allow locked linear movement and sound effects.
  • Main menu with options for single or multi play.
  • Puck with random start direction, fixed speed that increases with each hit of a paddle. Reset to centre when out of bounds with speed reset.
  • Game over screen with option to play again or return to main menu.
  • Sound effect for game end.
  • Game over screen active on first player to reach 10 points.
  • (Very) basic AI.

 

Identified bugs:

  • Sound effect for puck off screen.
  • Random direction on puck reset not working.
  • “AI Wins!” Rather than “Player 2 Wins!”.
  • Stop paddle movement on match end.
  • Text on game over screen wont highlight on mouse over.

Sources:

  • TV: https://purepng.com/photo/10623/clipart-old-television
  • Audio: https://kenney.nl/assets?q=audio
